conceptual definition: Indices (h k l) describing crystal plane orientation
numerical values or notations (if appli: (h k l) ∈ ℤ (where ℤ is a set of all integers )
remarks/purpose: Identification of crystallographic planes within a crystal lattice

numerical values or notations (if appli: different constraints imposed upon crystal structure types
remarks/purpose: predict material properties and behavior guided by crystal orientation

conceptual definition: a set of parameters that describe the size and shape of a crystal lattice
numerical values or notations (if appli: a b and c in the unit of Å ; α β and  γ in unit of degrees(°)
